title: Its actually Funny
body:
So i got my Acc banned, nice 300 € and 7 LVL 7 MAstery Champs + 250 MAstery + endless special Icons gone. Why? Because i refuse to play with fkn Idiots. I wont play thia game anymore thats it. You guys may say well tahnk god u toxic piece of shit but im not toxic. Infact every 2 days i get added by people who want to play with me simply because im funny, good and a tolerant person. But sometiems in this game u get fkn scumbags who screw you over and u can do nothing about it. People in low silver/bronze who just visit midlane take a wave and leave. Ive peaked Plat 5 last season and had a MMR of about 1800 when i grinded Morgana support only and ended playing with diamond 3 People. I know this game in and out im not a Challenger player but i have played with and vs Masters i know that is up in this game. Earlier this Season i did my Placement and won them 8/2 and played with Plat and Diamond vs Plat and Diamond and got Placed Silver fucking 5 !!!! I didnt mind because i knew well if im S5 the rest of the Goldies/Plats are probably near me. And so it was at the beginning of the Season in every S5 Game were People with Plat/Gold Borders even Twice someone with a Diamond 5 Border who just got placed lower because the system downgraded everyone and challengers were maximum plat 1 while 3 Separated Divisions got pressed into Bronze.

 I will come to the Point. Opposed to last Season i didnt grinded my best champions like morgana but i actually had fun grinding champion matery on others champions and playing other roles i wanted to win every game but i didnt wanted to "hard carry" every game. My goal wasnt Challenger Rank 1 but simply play serious league of legends. And because i myself am i good player compared to Sivler Bronze standards i can play Champions im not 100% familiar with always at a gold 5 level (unless their kit is like Azir super different from anything else) but then i dont play them. Im not purposely loosing any games i just cant hard carry them. U can look my match history I never really FEED and if say i open mid yeah i open mid but i dont feed down mid i go jungle and farm camps or hang around somewhere not feeding because lets be fair here. In silver and bronze the peple are the dumbest fucking idiots in this game. Gold isnt better but Gold at least knows their limits to some extend. SILVER/BRONZE have no Idea about Anything. They just Coin Flip everytime they are in the game and the only Reason they Win is because the enemy is just worse. Its not about plays happen or Objectives secured its just pure luck on who is going to fuck up harder. Macro decisions are not existent in thsi bracket these kdis Spam Ping everyone everytime they arent satisfied witht he way u played a situation. If u text them i cant leash im tryndamere flash ignite i try to wait in the bush and cheese the toplaner they will fkn spamping the shit out of you. 

If u are mid and keep up your cs vs a bad matchup or even a good one they will force gank a lvl 3 gank and no matter what u know it they will take XP and farm from your lane EVERYTIME EVERY GAME. If u are splitpushing and basicly taking turret after turret they will stil manage to do nothing in midlane wait there and spamping u to go back. They wont use their summoners EVER when they die for the first time. Junglers can walk over 2 wards these guys wont notice it and when they die they will blame the jungler. FLEX Q Premades will Insult you so hard if happen to get autofilled support or even if u are actually a good support (like me) who actually knows how to play support with many champions. U cant endure the amount of bullshti thrown at you without saying anything. I got my ACC Perma Banned now u might say well after 14 day ban u might know whats coming. But heres the thing, after my 14 Day Suspension which i got suspended for roughly the same language as in this chatlog i was ineligable to get loot. And only yesterday after like a month of league playing aproximately 5 games a day i was eligible again. So i basicly served the 14 Day sentence + the unclear amount of time which takes to get loot again. Because the System obviously marked me as reformed and i got loot again. 

So if the "system" marks me as reformed and i get loot again that obviously Prooves that im not toxic in the Majority of my games. But still as i log in today i see the message "PERMA BANNED" an i read the chatlogs and think WTF, yesterday i got loot and all was fine and now all of a sudden im banned?

Here is the chatlogs see for yourselves. I dont verbally harrass anyone personally. 

Game 1
FzeroF0X: dont take blue wtf
FzeroF0X: ?????????#
FzeroF0X: MAN DONT FARM MID
FzeroF0X: U FKN BRONZE PLAYER
FzeroF0X: go away
FzeroF0X: OPEN MID
FzeroF0X: let fucking lee sin or malzahar take fucking midlnae
FzeroF0X: obviously they cant play without stealing farm and xp
FzeroF0X: come one time again mid and take one fucking minion i go afk
FzeroF0X: open mid
FzeroF0X: im ungle
FzeroF0X: wont fkn enter any fight
FzeroF0X: thats that
FzeroF0X: gg wp
FzeroF0X: stfu man im doing my best just for this kids to screw me over
FzeroF0X: wont fucking happen
FzeroF0X: buddy
FzeroF0X: oh now its annie pls
FzeroF0X: huh
FzeroF0X: ok
FzeroF0X: last chance
FzeroF0X: if i say fuck off then u fcuk off
FzeroF0X: i win this game easy man
FzeroF0X: easy
FzeroF0X: the easiest task of my lfe is to win this game
FzeroF0X: but i wont
FzeroF0X: if u fkn keep screwing me over
FzeroF0X: see?
FzeroF0X: man
FzeroF0X: i am fkn diamond player
FzeroF0X: i win this game easy
FzeroF0X: but
FzeroF0X: i wont fkn carry kids like you
FzeroF0X: im in my promo
FzeroF0X: thats how much ic are about ranked
FzeroF0X: NOTHING
FzeroF0X: i dont give a f about ranked
FzeroF0X: #
FzeroF0X: dont come to midlaner lane and take cs and never give blue
FzeroF0X: its simple
FzeroF0X: just easy
FzeroF0X: again
FzeroF0X: now he calls me stupid
FzeroF0X: whatever dude
FzeroF0X: stay bad noone cares
FzeroF0X: afk moe farm then enemy mid
FzeroF0X: still u flame
FzeroF0X: thats how u are
FzeroF0X: uncarryable
FzeroF0X: just play all muted
Game 2
FzeroF0X: open mid
FzeroF0X: killed the first minion
FzeroF0X: denied first melee xp
FzeroF0X: killed your midlle lane
FzeroF0X: now i trol your game
FzeroF0X: u fkn troll temmo support
FzeroF0X: cancer team
FzeroF0X: sheer cancer
FzeroF0X: no other word describes this fkn incompetent random 4 peple with no brain whatsoever
FzeroF0X: live to breath
FzeroF0X: and tha it
FzeroF0X: brain afk
FzeroF0X: whole life
FzeroF0X: never questione
FzeroF0X: just obey
FzeroF0X: the british have a word for this
FzeroF0X: it starts with F and I and finsih with S
FzeroF0X: nautilus
FzeroF0X: u are a F R P O D S
FzeroF0X: 0 '%
FzeroF0X: brain
FzeroF0X: 0%
FzeroF0X: GO IN
FzeroF0X: GOGOGOGOGOGO
FzeroF0X: TOO ALTe
FzeroF0X: GOP BACK
FzeroF0X: if i played with 3 monkeys
FzeroF0X: they would play better then what you do
FzeroF0X: pure coma
FzeroF0X: srsy nautlus
FzeroF0X: ua er so fkn affraid
FzeroF0X: u ahve 2 tanks
FzeroF0X: just dive these guys
FzeroF0X: but u go abck
FzeroF0X: because u ahve no balls man
FzeroF0X: u have no brain and no balls
FzeroF0X: 4 top
FzeroF0X: report nautilus
FzeroF0X: fkn tryharder
FzeroF0X: never won a game in his life
FzeroF0X: looka t him
FzeroF0X: no friends
FzeroF0X: how to say forever alone in french?
FzeroF0X: after feeding like 5 kills for no reason
FzeroF0X: he all of a susden plays for the objective
FzeroF0X: tryharder
FzeroF0X: forever alone
Game 3
FzeroF0X: i wont leash go bot
FzeroF0X: i want to
FzeroF0X: fight
FzeroF0X: open top
FzeroF0X: im goona fuk with this graves and his fuking spam ping a little
FzeroF0X: thats what u get for spam ping
FzeroF0X: remember it
FzeroF0X: all your life
FzeroF0X: i told you kindly i acnt elashg o bot
FzeroF0X: u spam pinged
FzeroF0X: i fucked up
FzeroF0X: my fight vs her
FzeroF0X: i waited for her and writed fucking text to you for no reason
FzeroF0X: because u fkn kid cant fucking undertsnad that people have fucking other plans then your aas
FzeroF0X: MAN STOP FARM THIS LANYe
FzeroF0X: DO YOU GET IT INTO YOUR FKN BRAIN
FzeroF0X: IT DOESNT MATTER THAT U ARE ADC
FzeroF0X: U AHVE A WHOLE CHAMPION DEDICATED TO FN GET YOUR THROUGH THE ANE PHASE
FzeroF0X: GO BOTLANE AND FUCKING FARM THERE
FzeroF0X: vayne
FzeroF0X: worst adc in this game
FzeroF0X: 100% banned because noen wnats to ahve a shitty vayne likethis on the team
FzeroF0X: yeah what
FzeroF0X: i was only waiting for you and u again spam ping
FzeroF0X: ekko
FzeroF0X: u died with out ult the 2nd time
FzeroF0X: dont ping me
FzeroF0X: igo afk
FzeroF0X: iahve no problem maming u loose htis

That feel when you're picking out the toxic quotes and you scroll down accidently and see this reply
http://memecrunch.com/meme/3O6AF/i-cri-evrytiem/image.png?w=400&c=1
You're right, it's actually funny that you sincerely consider yourself not toxic.

HAHAHAHAHAHAHA YOU GOT BANNED CAUSE YOU WERE TOXIC! THAT IS HILLARIOUS!!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

You were right though 

> 100% banned
Tldr: good riddance, you wont be missed or even remembered.

bsg players claiming to have played with masters
maybe in norms but who cares in norms who you play with unless its a rioter

Yeah you were harassing/negative attitude towards you team in all 3 logs
it may not be extreme but if you were banned for it
It was due to the fact you have previously been punished and this is you showing no effort to be a better person in league

these sentences just might have triggered the automated response system.


> FzeroF0X: ?????????#(toxic)
> FzeroF0X: U FKN BRONZE PLAYER(verbal harassment)
> FzeroF0X: OPEN MID(negative attitude)
> FzeroF0X: let fucking lee sin or malzahar take fucking midlnae(probably toxic, not sure)
> FzeroF0X: obviously they cant play without stealing farm and xp(definetly toxic)
> FzeroF0X: come one time again mid and take one fucking minion i go afk(threathening to afk)
> FzeroF0X: open mid(negative attitude)
> FzeroF0X: wont fkn enter any fight(negative attitude)
> FzeroF0X: stfu man im doing my best just for this kids to screw me over(a little bit toxic, probably not report worthy)
> FzeroF0X: if i say fuck off then u fcuk off(toxic)

> FzeroF0X: i win this game easy man FzeroF0X: easy FzeroF0X: the easiest task of my lfe is to win this game FzeroF0X: but i wont
(these 4 sentences are you admitting you are intentionally throwing this game and you threatening other players)

> FzeroF0X: if u fkn keep screwing me over(negative)

> FzeroF0X: i am fkn diamond player FzeroF0X: i win this game easy FzeroF0X: but  FzeroF0X: i wont fkn carry kids like you
>(again admitting to intentionally throwing)


> FzeroF0X: i dont give a f about ranked(again intentionally losing here)
> FzeroF0X: #(hashtag)

> Game 2

> FzeroF0X: live to breath(breath to live)
> FzeroF0X: brain afk(accusation)
> FzeroF0X: just obey(really, a 1984 reference, I don't think orwell agreed that idiots in games are just as bad as a brain control society)
> FzeroF0X: it starts with F and I and finsih with S(fish without the h?)

> FzeroF0X: tryharder(tryharding is not bad yaknow)
> FzeroF0X: forever alone(toxic)

> Game 3
> FzeroF0X: open top(giving up)
> FzeroF0X: i waited for her and writed fucking text to you for no reason(toxic)
> FzeroF0X: because u fkn kid cant fucking undertsnad that people have fucking other plans then your aas(insult)

> FzeroF0X: DO YOU GET IT INTO YOUR FKN BRAIN(toxic)

> FzeroF0X: U AHVE A WHOLE CHAMPION DEDICATED TO FN GET YOUR THROUGH THE ANE PHASE(toxic)
> FzeroF0X: GO BOTLANE AND FUCKING FARM THERE(4 sentence combo breaker toxic)
> FzeroF0X: worst adc in this game(nah i am worse)
> FzeroF0X: 100% banned because noen wnats to ahve a shitty vayne likethis on the team(salty)
> FzeroF0X: igo afk(threatening to afk)
> FzeroF0X: iahve no problem maming u loose htis(really salty there)

you almost harass more in 3 games then i do in 3 seasons. Whether or not you consider these insults to be to far is not the point here. Toxicity of this level is against the terms of service.

as for the permanent ban, try to contact support.riotgames.com, they might return it to a 14 day ban. Probably not tho.
